chapter.text: 15|1|alif, laam, ra. vo is puskat tatha khule quraan kee aayaten hain.
15|2|(ek samay aayega) jab kaafir ye kaamana karenge ki kya hee achchha hota, yadi ve musalaaman[1] hote
15|3|(he nabee!)aap unhen chhod den, ve khaate tatha aanand lete rahen aur unhen aasha nishchet kiye rahe, phir sheeghr hee ve jaan lenge[1].
15|4|aur hamane jis bastee ko bhee dhvast kiya, usake lie ek nishchit avadhi ant thee.
15|5|koee jaati na apanee nishchit avadhi se aage ja sakatee hai aur na peechhe rah sakatee hai.
15|6|tatha un (kaafiron) ne kahaah he vah vyakti jisapar ye shiksha (quraan) utaaree gayee hai! vaastav mein, too paagal hai.
15|7|kyon hamaare paas farishton ko nahin laata, yadi too sachon mein se hai
15|8|jabaki ham farishton ko saty nirnay ke saath hee[1] utaarate hain aur unhen us samay koee avasar nahin diya jaata.
15|9|vaastav mein, hamane hee ye shiksha (quraan) utaaree hai aur ham hee isake rakshak[1] hain.
15|10|aur hamane aapase pahale bhee praacheen (vigat) jaatiyon mein rasool bheje.
15|11|aur unake paas jo bhee rasool aaya, ve usake saath parihaas karate rahe.
15|12|isee prakaar, ham ise[1] aparaadhiyon ke dilon mein piro dete hain.
15|13|ve usapar eemaan nahin laate aur pratham jaatiyon se yahee reeti chalee aa rahee hai.
15|14|aur yadi ham unapar aakaash ka koee dvaar khol dete, phir ve usamen chadhane lagate.
15|15|tababhee ve yahee kahate ki hamaaree aankhen dhokha kha rahee hain, balki hamapar jaadoo kar diya gaya hai.
15|16|hamane aakaash mein raashi-chakr banaaye hain aur use dekhane vaalon ke lie susajjit kiya hai.
15|17|aur use pratyek dhikkaare hue shaitaan se surakshit kiya hai.
15|18|parantu jo (shaitaan) choree se sunana chaahe, to ek khulee jvaala usaka peechha karatee[1] hai.
15|19|aur hamane dharatee ko phailaaya aur usamen parvat bana diye aur usamen hamane pratyek uchit cheezen ugaayeen.
15|20|aur hamane usamen tumhaare lie jeevan ke sansaadhan bana diye tatha unake lie jinake jeevika daata tum nahin ho.
15|21|aur koee cheez aisee nahin hai, jisake kosh hamaare paas na hon aur ham use ek nishchit maatra hee mein utaarate hain.
15|22|aur hamane jalabharee vaayuon ko bheja, phir aakaash se jal barasaaya aur use tumhen pilaaya tatha tum usake koshaadhikaaree nahin ho.
15|23|tatha ham hee jeevan dete tatha maarate hain aur ham hee sabake uttaraadhikaaree hain.
15|24|tatha tumamen se vigat logon ko jaanate hain aur bhavishy ke logon ko bhee jaanate hain.
15|25|aur vaastav, mein aapaka paalanahaar hee unhen ekatr karega[1], nishchay vah sab gun aur sab kuchh jaanane vaala hai.
15|26|aur hamane manushy ko sade hue keechad ke sookhe gaare banaaya.
15|27|aur isase pahale jinnon ko hamane agni kee jvaala se paida kiya.
15|28|aur (yaad karo) jab aapake paalanahaar ne farishton se kahaah main ek manushy utpann karane vaala hoon, sade hue keechad ke sookhe gaare se.
15|29|to jab main use poora bana loon aur usamen apanee aatma phoonk doon, to usake lie sajde mein gir jaana[1].
15|30|atah unasab farishton ne sajda kiya.
15|31|iblees ke siva. usane sajda karane vaalon ka saath dene se inkaar kar diya.
15|32|allaah ne poochhaah he iblees! tujhe kya hua ki sajda karane vaalon ka saath nahin diya
15|33|usane kahaah main aisa nahin hoon ki ek manushy ko sajda karoon, jise toone sade hue keechad ke sookhe gaare se paida kiya hai.
15|34|allaah ne kahaah yahaan se nikal ja, vaastav mein, too dhikkaara hua hai.
15|35|aur tujhapar dhikkaar hai, pratikaar (pralay) ke din tak.
15|36|(iblees) ne kahaah[1] mere paalanahaar! too phir mujhe us din tak avasar de, jab sabhee punah jeevit kiye jaayenge.
15|37|allaah ne kahaah tujhe avasar de diya gaya hai.
15|38|vidhdit samay ke din tak ke lie.
15|39|vah bolaah mere paalanahaar! tere, mujhako kupath kar dene ke kaaran, main avashy unake lie dharatee mein (teree avagya ko) manoram bana doonga aur unasabhee ko kupath kar doonga.
15|40|unamen se tere shudhd bhakton ke siva.
15|41|allaah ne kahaah yahee mujhatak (pahunchane kee) seedhee raah hai.
15|42|vastutah, mere bhakton par tera koee adhikaar nahin[1] chalega, sivaay usake jo kupathon mein se tera anusaran kare.
15|43|aur vaastav mein, unasabake lie narak ka vachan hai.
15|44|us (narak) ke saat dvaar hain aur unamen se pratyek dvaar ke lie ek vibhaajit bhaag[1] hai.
15|45|vaastav mein, aagyaakaaree log svargon tatha sroton mein honge.
15|46|(unase kaha jaayega) isamen pravesh kar jao, shaanti ke saath nirbhay hokar.
15|47|aur ham nikaal denge unake dilon mein jo kuchh bair hoga. ve bhaee-bhaee hokar ek-doosare ke sammukh takhton ke oopar rahenge.
15|48|na usamen unhen koee thakaan hogee aur na vahaan se nikaale jaayenge.
15|49|(he nabee!) aap mere bhakton ko soochit kar den ki vaastav mein, main bada kshamaasheel dayaavaan[1] hoon.
15|50|aur meree yaatana hee duhkhadaayee yaatana hai.
15|51|aur aap unhen ibraaheem ke atithiyon ke baare mein soochit kar den.
15|52|jab ve ibraaheem ke paas aaye, to salaam kiya. usane kahaah vaastav mein, ham tumase dar rahe hain.
15|53|unhonne kahaah daro nahin, ham tumhen ek gyaanee baalak kee shubh soochana de rahe hain.
15|54|usane kahaah kya tumane mujhe is budhaape mein shubh soochana dee hai, tum mujhe ye shubh soochana kaise de rahe ho
15|55|unhonne kahaah hamane tumhen saty shubh soochana dee hai, atah tum niraash na ho.
15|56|(ibraaheem) ne kahaah apane paalanahaar kee daya se niraash, keval kupath log hee hua karate hain.
15|57|usane kahaah he allaah ke bheje hue farishto! tumhaara abhiyaan kya hai
15|58|unhonne uttar diya ki ham ek aparaadhee jaati ke paas bheje gaye hain.
15|59|loot ke gharaane ke siva, unasabhee ko ham bachaane vaale hain.
15|60|parantu loot kee patni ke lie hamane nirnay kiya hai ki vah peechhe rah jaane vaalon mein hogee.
15|61|phir jab loot ke ghar bheje hue (farishte) aaye.
15|62|to loot ne kahaah tum (mere lie) aparichit ho.
15|63|unhonne kahaah daro nahin, balki ham tumhaare paas vo (yaatana) laaye hain, jisake baare mein ve sandeh kar rahe the.
15|64|ham tumhaare paas saty laaye hain aur vaastav mein, ham satyavaadee hain.
15|65|atah kuchh raat rah jaaye, to apane gharaane ko lekar nikal jao aur tum unake peechhe raho aur tumamen se koee phirakar na dekhe tatha chale jao, jahaan aadesh diya ja raha hai.
15|66|aur hamane loot ko nirnay suna diya ki bhor hote hee inaka unmoolan kar diya jaayega.
15|67|aur nagar vaasee prasann hokar aa gaye[1].
15|68|loot ne kahaah ye mere atithi hain, atah mera apamaan na karo.
15|69|tatha allaah se daro aur mera anaadar na karo.
15|70|unhonne kahaah kya hamane tumhen vishv vaasiyon se nahin roka[1] tha
15|71|loot ne kahaah ye meree putriyaan hain, yadi tum kuchh karane vaale[1] ho.
15|72|he nabee! aapakee aayu kee shapath[1]! vaastav mein, ve apane unmaad mein bahak rahe the.
15|73|antatah, sooryoday ke samay unhen ek kadee dhvani ne pakad liya.
15|74|phir hamane us bastee ke ooparee bhaag ko neeche kar diya aur unapar kankareele patthar barasa diye.
15|75|vaastav mein, isamen kaee nishaaniyaan hain, pratibhaashaaliyon[1] ke lie.
15|76|aur vah (bastee) saadhaaran[1] maarg par sthit hai.
15|77|nihsandeh isamen badee nishaanee hai, eemaan valon ke lie.
15|78|aur vaastav mein, (aiyka) ke[1] vaasee atyaachaaree the.
15|79|to hamane unase badala le liya aur ve donon[1] hee saadhaaran maarg par hain.
15|80|aur haî€¼ijr ke[1] logon ne rasoolon ko jhuthalaaya.
15|81|aur unhen hamane apanee aayaten (nishaaniyaan) deen, to ve unase vimukh hee rahe.
15|82|ve shilaakaaree karake parvaton se ghar banaate aur nirbhay hokar rahate the.
15|83|antatah, unhen kadee dhvani ne bhor ke samay pakad liya.
15|84|aur unakee kamaee unake kuchh kaam na aayee.

15|85|aur hamane aakaashon tatha dharatee ko aur jo kuchh un donon ke beech hai, saty ke aadhaar par hee utpann kiya hai aur nishchay pralay aanee hai. atah (he nabee!) aap (unhen) bhale taur par kshama kar den.
15|86|vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee sabaka sreshta, sarvagy hai.
15|87|tatha (he nabee!) hamane aapako saat aisee aayaten, jo baar-baar duharaee jaatee hain aur maha quraan[1] pradaan kiya hai.
15|88|aur aap, usakee or na dekhen, jo saansaarik laabh ka sansaadhan hamane unamen se vibhinn prakaar ke logon ko de rakha hai aur na unapar shok karen aur eemaan vaalon ke lie susheel rahen.
15|89|aur kah den ki main pratyaksh (khulee) chetaavanee[1] dene vaala hoon.
15|90|jaise hamane khandan kaariyon[1] par (yaatana) utaaree.
15|91|jinhonne quraan ko khand-khand kar diya[1].
15|92|to shapath hai aapake paalanahaar kee. ham unase avashy poochhenge.
15|93|tum kya karate rahe
15|94|atah aapako, jo aadesh diya ja raha hai, use kholakar suna den aur mushrikon (mishramavaadiyon) kee chinta na karen.
15|95|ham aapake lie parihaas karane vaalon ko kaafee hain.
15|96|jo allaah ke saath doosare poojy bana lete hain, to unhen sheeghr gyaan ho jaayega.
15|97|aur ham jaanate hain ki unakee baaton se aapaka dil sankuchit ho raha hai.
15|98|atah aap apane paalanahaar kee prashansa ke saath usakee pavitrata ka varnan karen tatha sajda karane vaalon mein rahen.
15|99|aur apane paalanahaar kee ibaadat (vandana) karate rahen, yahaan tak ki aapake paas vishvaas aa jaaye[1].
